hiveArticle.title: Phishing Link Checker Chrome Extension
hiveArticle.body:
The video helps to get in speed with what CheckSteemitLink Extension does, what all the features it has. This extension checks the phishing link in Steemit. A lot and lot of people are losing their hard-earned because of the phishing links all over the place. This chrome extension helps you warn before hand if it finds Phishing Links. It will show below which link you are on.
▶️ DTube
▶️ IPFS
